description.en: Chimpion is an all in one ecommerce, point of sale, digital wallet with crypto to fiat settlement system. Chimpion’s is launching e-commerce storefronts that allow merchants to accept cryptocurrency payments, choosing their favorite altcoin as the base currency denomination and allowing the merchant to settle their crypto into fiat through a stablecoin.

ico_data.short_desc: Chimpion is an all in one ecommerce, point of sale, digital wallet with crypto to fiat settlement system.

status_updates.description: Fast, safe and efficient, join Chimpion pay today and join an ever growing digital market with customers from every corner of the globe, sign up here https://chimpion.io/merchant/
Bnana is now live on sistemkoin, which is one of Turkey's largest exchanges, enabling our users to trade Bnana for turkey's local currency lira. Trade today https://sistemkoin.com
Want to invest into Chimpion? Check out Mercatox our exchange partner for all things BNANA with 3 supported trading pairs https://mercatox.com/exchange/BNANA/BTC

We’d like to share our 4th Quarter Buyback report Chimpion has managed to raise 38,800 dollars across our project channels. We’d like to extend our gratitude to our investors and community members, so once again thank you for choosing Chimpion. Details at t.ly/k2J8q
Chimpion is your champion of all things cryptocurrency. Use our digital wallet to trade, invest, shop, pay, and keep up to date with crypto news.
Looking for a way to accept cryptocurrency payments? Chimpion is your champion.
Chimpion a community driven project built to help shape the future of digital payments, the team behind Chimpion would like to thank both our old and new community for helping support the project.
